title: Veeam security advisory (AV25-352)
description: On June 17, 2025, Veeam published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Veeam Backup & Replication  version 12.3.1.1139 and prior
Veeam Agent for Microsoft Windows  version 6.3.1.1074 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
